body:
Hello,

When I try to install libjpeg-turbo as part of installing py-rpy2, I get a failure with this message.
```
 ==> Installing libjpeg-turbo
==> Searching for binary cache of libjpeg-turbo
==> No binary for libjpeg-turbo found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /locus/home/tnelakuditi/code/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/a6/a69598bf079463b34d45ca7268462a18b6507fdaa62bb1dfd212f02041499b5d.tar.gz
==> Staging archive: /scratch/29141582.1.dev-long/tnelakuditi/spack-stage/spack-stage-libjpeg-turbo-2.0.3-tumgxx7wpkupo6nhqhkglytqli4re5my/2.0.3.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /scratch/29141582.1.dev-long/tnelakuditi/spack-stage/spack-stage-libjpeg-turbo-2.0.3-tumgxx7wpkupo6nhqhkglytqli4re5my
==> No patches needed for libjpeg-turbo
==> Building libjpeg-turbo [Package]
==> Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: InstallError: Install failed for libjpeg-turbo.  Nothing was installed!

/locus/home/tnelakuditi/code/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:1993, in sanity_check_prefix:
       1990        installed.difference_update(
       1991            spack.store.layout.hidden_file_paths)
       1992        if not installed:
  >>   1993            raise InstallError(
       1994                "Install failed for %s.  Nothing was installed!" % self.name)
```

I am using the latest version of spack.  Should I include any more information for debugging?

Thank you,
Teja.
title: libjpeg-turbo installation fails
